name: hugh the friend
description:
A little friend for your computer, pretty minimal. His favorite thing to do is get in the way of menu options. Hugh won't slow down your computer, either. The file size is the size of a hamster nose.

INSTRUCTIONS:

he moves around so you could just watch him OR:

Give him a boop and hear him make sound!

Press space or import a color code to personalize him!

Name your hugh to personalize him even more

Go into the forums to share names, color codes, and where he hops around!

Originally he would just jump around and be a derp, but now you can name him or something.

PLANNED UPDATES:

- Hugh hats

- Hugh activities (defecating, peeing, sleeping, etc.)

- EXTREME MODE WHERE HE TRIES TO COMMIT DIE
